programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Vapaaehtoiset joutuvat lumimyrskyyn, hyisiin jokiin ja koviin pakkasiin. Heista tuntuu, etta peli on menetetty, mutta takaisinkaan ei voi enaa kaantya.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Murphy-koiranpentu syo palan koria, ja kun se poistetaan leikkauksella, loytyy vatsasta epanormaali verisuoni. Kirurgi Kathryn kauhistuu sen kokoa, pystyyko han parantamaan sen?

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Kun mangabi-apinaemo hylkaa poikasensa, pystyyko tiimi kasvattamaan sen? Ciaran valmistaa gorilloja uutta sademetsaa varten, ja tarantellat herkuttelevat sirkoilla.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven tuloon on enaa viikkoja, ja perheet yrittavat tayttaa ruokavarastojaan. Heimo ja Charlie pelkaavat, ettei heilla ole tarpeeksi lihaa talveksi.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrest sukeltaa Indonesian Jaavalle etsimaan jaavantiikeria. Laji julistettiin sukupuuttoon kuolleeksi vuonna 2003, mutta siita on ilmoitettu hiljattain uusia nakohavaintoja.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Koira kaivaa ojia takapihalle ja sen omistajat tayttavat ne puskutraktorilla. Myohemmin vuohet ryntailevat synttarijuhlissa ja koira varastaa omistajansa alusvaatteita.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistilalla, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Brownit lisaavat puolustusvalmiuttaan loydettyaan vaarallisen saalistajan maatilansa laheisyydesta.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Gorillaperhe muuttaa vihdoin uuteen kotiinsa sademetsaan, mutta onko se mieleinen? Mangabi-poikanen tutustuu laumansa. Maatilalla otetaan vastaan vastasyntyneita karitsoja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff on hylattyna ja jalka poikki loytyneen koiranpennun ainoa toivo. Vastaanotolla hoidetaan bostoninterrieria, jolla on vakavan sairauden oireita.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalliin hintaluokan kustomoituja autoja ja harvinaisia malleja suunnitteleva yritys tilaa eksoottisen akvaarion. Valtavasta kolmitahoisesta akvaariosta tulee sen keskipiste!

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Bassetilla on perussairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin tekemaa leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Yuki-bulldoggi on syonyt jotain sopimatonta, ja elainlaakari Blue yrittaa loytaa sen. Elainlaakari Lavignen adoptoima kissa tarvitsee kaksoisamputaation jalkeista hoitoa.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Kadonnutta kalastajaa etsitaan pelastuspartion avulla. Poliisit kuulustelevat uusintarikollista metsastajien hairinnasta, ja rikollinen jaa kiinni laittoman tuliaseen kanssa.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Puumajarakentamisen erikoisosaaja Pete Nelson kay lapi kaudella aikaisemmin nayttamatonta kuvamateriaalia, muistelee hurjia tilanteita ja epaortodoksisia rakennustekniikoita.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10, osa 19. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls and Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson miettii miten hillita ahdistuneen kissan holtitonta virtsailua. Miten huonoa omaatuntoa poteva omistaja saadaan lopettamaan lasagnen syottaminen diabeetikkokissalleen?

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell tallentaa lampokuvia, joiden han uskoo olevan isojalka. Mireya ja Ronny kokevat kauhun hetkia tajutessaan, etteivat he ole metsassa yksin.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Laakarit huomaavat jouluvauvan synnyttya, etta se on saanut kohdussa aivotulehduksen. Nainen luulee, etta hanen silmassaan on mato. Mies saa ilkean yllatyksen leikkauksen jalkeen.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 2/8. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa. Heidan asiakaskuntansa koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell tallentaa lampokuvia, joiden han uskoo olevan isojalka. Mireya ja Ronny kokevat kauhun hetkia tajutessaan, etteivat he ole metsassa yksin.

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Laakarit huomaavat jouluvauvan synnyttya, etta se on saanut kohdussa aivotulehduksen. Nainen luulee, etta hanen silmassaan on mato. Mies saa ilkean yllatyksen leikkauksen jalkeen.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson tyoskentelee aidin ja tyttaren kanssa, joiden kissakaksikko kay keskenaan aluetaistelua. Hairikko-kissa Bowie saa Jacksonin kanssa viimeisen tilaisuuden korjata tapansa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 2/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Bronxin elaintarhan paivittainen elamanrytmi muodostuu elainten hoidosta, ja samalla yleisoa opastetaan villielaimista ja luonnonsuojelusta.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Kun mangabi-apinaemo hylkaa poikasensa, pystyyko tiimi kasvattamaan sen? Ciaran valmistaa gorilloja uutta sademetsaa varten, ja tarantellat herkuttelevat sirkoilla.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Nuoren miehen lemmikkivuohi on loukkaantunut onnettomuudessa. Gus-koira on nielaissut tuntemattoman esineen ja on ollut siita lahtien huonovointinen.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NASCAR-kuljettaja Kurt Busch ja hanen vaimonsa haluavat akvaarioonsa pikku paratiisin. He tilaavat pienoismallin haapaikastaan!

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Kaapiovuohi saapuu vastaanotolle paiseen takia. Elainlaakari Lavignella riittaa toita kameroita pelkaavan suojelukoiran kanssa. Bluet jarjestavat sukupuolenpaljastamisjuhlat.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Agentit kohtaavat joukon ankanmetsastajia, jotka havaitaan tappavan muita kuin riista-lintuja. Luvattoman maille tunkeutumisen tutkinta johtaa vaaralliseen kohtaukseen.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mosambikista hengenvaarallista "paholaisenkukan" rukoilijasirkkaa. Terien ja koukkujen peittama hyonteinen on lahes huomaamaton, silla se nayttaa trooppiselta kukalta.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, jakso 12. Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan. (Little Giants, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa viehattavan vanhan ajan jokivarsi-teemaisen puumajan Mississipin rannalle.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 9, osa 7. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 2/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Nuoren miehen lemmikkivuohi on loukkaantunut onnettomuudessa. Gus-koira on nielaissut tuntemattoman esineen ja on ollut siita lahtien huonovointinen.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kausi 6, osa 1. Parhaat ystavat ja kilpakumppanit Wayde King ja Brett Raymer luotsaavat menestyksekasta Acrylic Tank Manufacturing -perheyritysta, jonka osaava tiimi toteuttaa akvaarioharrastajien villeimmatkin unelmat. Tiimin kasissa merenalainen maailma syntyy niin baaritiskin yhteyteen kuin pyramidin muotoon. (Tanked, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talvi saapuu, mutta vahainen lumentulo rajoittaa perheiden toimintaa, kun moottorikelkoista ei ole hyotya. Charlie ja Heimo virittavat ansoja.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Brownit lisaavat puolustusvalmiuttaan loydettyaan vaarallisen saalistajan maatilansa laheisyydesta.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Agentit kohtaavat joukon ankanmetsastajia, jotka havaitaan tappavan muita kuin riista-lintuja. Luvattoman maille tunkeutumisen tutkinta johtaa vaaralliseen kohtaukseen.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Koira kaivaa ojia takapihalle ja sen omistajat tayttavat ne puskutraktorilla. Myohemmin vuohet ryntailevat synttarijuhlissa ja koira varastaa omistajansa alusvaatteita.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Inspiroivia tarinoita avuntarpeessa olevista elamista seka niita voimiaan saastelematta auttavista ihmisista ympari maailmaa.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Pelottavia ja koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksen jalkeen sinnikkaasti hengestaan esteista tai seuraamuksista huolimatta.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NASCAR-kuljettaja Kurt Busch ja hanen vaimonsa haluavat akvaarioonsa pikku paratiisin. He tilaavat pienoismallin haapaikastaan!

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Lavigne korjaa bionisella leikkauksella pitbullin revenneen polvinivelsiteen. Uusi elainlaakari Fedke hoitaa kissan ikavaa vammaa.

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Bassetilla on perussairaus, joka saattaa hankaloittaa elainlaakari Rossin tekemaa leikkausta. Elainlaakari Lavigne ei halua teknikkoa avukseen oman koiransa leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talvi saapuu, mutta vahainen lumentulo rajoittaa perheiden toimintaa, kun moottorikelkoista ei ole hyotya. Charlie ja Heimo virittavat ansoja.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels one of the most stunning rail routes of the world, through the former Russian empire from the Black Sea to the Caspian Sea, taking in present-day Georgia and Azerbaijan.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: No rain, no life. Thats the basic rule of survival on earth. Drought occurs in almost all types of climates. Of all the meteorological phenomena that can cause serious economic consequences, droughts are second only to hurricanes, according to the National Climatic Data Center. 5/8

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Alaskan residents are either hunting birds to stock up their freezers, training their young families how to fish or training up a puppy to be a hunting dog.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits Rauri on Rathlin Island, who left HR for off-grid life. They repaint Rauris house and discuss his health struggles, and a daring journey he made to help those in need.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: With over six billion of them across the planet, smartphones have changed the modern world. With rare access to electronics giant Samsung, Hannah uncovers the technological game changers that have made the smartphone a reality. She finds out how 1940s comic book hero Dick Tracy inspired the first mobile phone, discovers why the invention of the digital camera led to one of the biggest commercial blunders of all time and reveals what a 2010 South Korean sausage frenzy can tell us about touchscreens.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: In the wilderness of Northern Peru, the boys find themselves battling rough seas and desert landscapes in their quest to find a Humboldt Squid. Blowfish wants to catch one by hand to prove these feared creatures are misunderstood. 10/10

programme.title: Asia: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at this dazzling exploration of Earths biggest and most varied continent, Asia.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: No rain, no life. Thats the basic rule of survival on earth. Drought occurs in almost all types of climates. Of all the meteorological phenomena that can cause serious economic consequences, droughts are second only to hurricanes, according to the National Climatic Data Center. 5/8

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna returns to her birthplace, India, starting in the majestic ancient city of Hampi, in search of a kitchen cupboard staple once known as black gold

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to a remote corner of Spains Andalucan mountains to meet British couple Alan and Lorna, who have left their respective careers in Brighton to become alpaca farmers. He also goes in search of one of the worlds rarest big cats - the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With Alaska in bloom, its residents must continue to utilize their days to pursue resources and opportunities to enrich their lives.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in the Netherlands at one of the worlds biggest sauce factories. Its annual output is a quarter of a million tonnes of condiments,and more than 50 of this heads to the UK. Meanwhile Cherry Healey is making the glass jars Gregg needs for his mayonnaise. Shes at a vast factory in Maastricht where a furnace holding 250 tonnes of molten glass has been running continuously for the last 11 years.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: The dark, a world of opportunity for mammals. More than two-thirds prefer the cover of the night, with some now returning to the safety of the shadows in order to avoid us.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna Lumleys spice journey continues on the African island of Madagascar. Travelling overland, she discovers the secrets of the worlds second most expensive spice, vanilla.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Denises dogs lead her to a moose whos protective of her calf whilst Sue sets off on a fishing trip. The Hailstones take their children to search for blueberries.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures deep into the jungles of Guatemala, once home to an ancient Mayan civilisation but also Mike Merrill, a former sound engineer from Texas who is building a backpackers hostel.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Mammals have mastered every environment on Earth, but today the planet is changing faster than ever. Mammals must change with it to have a chance of survival in this, the new wild.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg visits Ribenas Gloucestershire factory, where 90% of Britains blackcurrants are turned into soft drinks. He is amazed to find out that the aroma of the blackcurrants is captured separately and later added back into the drink.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans brave the awakening landscape as the end of Winter nears.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to one of Britains furthest outposts, the Shetland Islands, to meet Helen and Jason - a couple just a few years into their new life on the edge of the weather-beaten island of Yell.

programme.title: The Great Intelligence Test
programme.desc: The Great British Intelligence Test measures the brainpower of the nation in one of the largest intelligence experiments of its kind.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: Tornadoes are among the most powerful forces on earth. With swirling winds of more than 300 miles per hour, and the strength to destroy nearly everything in their path, they account for an average of 60 deaths and millions of dollars in property damage every year.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Personal stories of those caught up in sometimes deadly natural catastrophes, accompanied by camera footage showing meteorological phenomena, including hurricanes, earthquakes, monsoons and more.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: In Budapest Joanna explores the river by boat and rides a unique childrens railway, as well as discovering the citys Jewish heritage.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: Known as "hurricanes" in the North Atlantic Ocean, "typhoons" in the Northwest Pacific Ocean, and "cyclones" in the South Pacific and Indian Oceans, they are all the same thing: tropical storms. Every year, there seems to be an ever-increasing number of news stories about them.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: Hannah Fry discovers the hidden WWII radar technology that heats up baked beans, learns the legend of the melted candy bar in an engineers pocket that kick-started a kitchen revolution and puts her life on the line to demonstrate why microwaves zap food but not people!

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: The last leg of Joanna Lumleys journey takes her to Zanzibar, the spice island of Africa where merchants from around the world have left their mark on the architecture, religion and music.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Denise and Andy make a final grab for food from their vegetable garden. Ricko takes his children fishing adventure on Yukon River. Sue hunts for caribou.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the Ozark Plateau in Missouri to live with wilderness expert, Bo Brown, who gave up life on the road with his band to teach Stone Age skills to modern day man.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: From freshwater jungle ponds to the dark depths of the open ocean, air breathing mammals have found remarkable ways to overcome the many challenges of a life in water.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a cherry Bakewell factory in Stoke on Trent that produces 250,000 tarts every day, and meets the team of 12 employed to precisely place the cherries on top by hand. Cherry Healey learns the tricks of avoiding a soggy pastry bottom when baking at home, and visits a factory where almonds are roasted and milled to make butter. Historian Ruth Goodman discovers the origins of frangipane as a perfume in 17th-century Paris, and discovers how the modern cherry Bakewell recipe was arrived at by accident.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As winter comes to an end, Alaskans journey, hunt, and prepare for spring.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben is closer to home than hes ever been in rural Oxfordshire where he spends the week with a multi-generational family, who surrendered their conventional life.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael embarks on a railway journey through the modern south Indian states of Karnataka and Tamil Nadu, from the former princely state of Mysore to the first stronghold of the East India Company in Chennai, formerly Madras.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Actor Stephen Mangan and comedian Lara Ricote, who have never met before, aim to reach the northernmost point of Australia. 4/8

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A once in a generation eruption on a volcanic island. In the United States, heavy rain and snow melt submerge a town and in Italy, giant hail pulls up pavements, and traps drivers in their cars.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The tale of one of the largest dinosaurs ever to walk the earth, a colossal, long-necked Lusotitan. Living 150 million years ago on an island known as the Iberian Mesta, now in Portugal, this 25-metre-long titan dwarfs every other dinosaur in the region. Yet its intimidating size is only part of the story. The ultimate goal of the male of the species is to win over a female and secure his legacy. Its a quest that will see him embark on an epic journey as he risks his life for love.

programme.desc: Janina Ramirez sets out on a journey of discovery to unearth the story behind one of the worlds most underrated art forms, the ornate Turkish ceramics known as Iznik tiles.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasnt danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesnt dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and its automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish thats lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bears efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with "laser" party favors and are propelled onto an "unknown planet": a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to a Renaissance Faire where they must stop an evil court jester from ending the kings reignpermanently!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Thanks to a mysterious bag of magic beans, Bugs meets Elmer, a gentle giant who would like to build a castle in the clouds; its the perfect mission for DIYers.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital. / Its Tazs birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss shows hes still got it in the inventin department by coming up with a brain-swapping raygun. Just what the world needs. The Boss glory is short lived, though, when the raygun starts going off randomly. The Boss and Lamput trade places, and we get to see what it looks like when the worst boss in the world can also freak you out by morphing into orange stuff. Everyones acting topsy turvy, so its up to Specs and Skinny to straighten things out. Lucky those guys dont have brains to swap.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry dreams of a life where he is the lord of the manor, and Tom is the servant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerrys country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry uses Toms fear of cucumbers to startle him at every turn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Meathead has lost his marbles- really! Tom and Jerry visit the place where he last saw them, so he can compete in the marble championship.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger loves that Little Quacker visits her new birdbath. Unfortunately, Tom and Spike try their hardest to get him to move out.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.desc: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realizes its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through the rangers books of fairytales the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By pure chance, Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the rangers console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzys in love thinks shes a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike demonstrates for Tuffy what it takes to be a dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The cat and mouse detectives pose as bellhops at a swanky hotel to catch a jewel thief.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffys wish to be as strong as Spike comes true.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An old pair of Gingers tap shoes turns Tom into a tap dancing fanatic.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchesss surprise birthday party for her nephew, Rupert, and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before he is turned into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and the mission are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: One cats delicacy is another mouses poison. Tom and Jerry get caught in a thorny issue over the aroma of durian. Will the King of Fruits help reconcile their differences?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads the Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. When his crane breaks down, his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, so they set out to build him a new one thats smash-proof.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of Duplicate Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput cant stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He cant afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Batwheels
