programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to drive a mile in each others wheels in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Barneys World - Meet Barney
programme.desc: Vivie cant wait to show Barney her new picture -- just as soon as she can find the purple marker she needs to finish it! Barney encourages Vivie to clean up to find it, and Vivie learns that cleaning as you go can help you play!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a "friends tree" mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a forest song, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it. Does Lilit tell the truth or does she just carry on pretending to like it?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look. And now everyone is using their adorable power to get Mushpie to do what they want!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding ... until she tries it!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the babys parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzys liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robots artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoos refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedias instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabins interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzys cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: its been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang enter Dickens classic ?A Christmas Carol?, as they try to get to the bottom of the mysterious ghost tormenting Scrooge in 1843 England. Unfortunately, the Ghosts begin to convince Velma shes on a disastrous path of her own.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Unhappy about a mystery-free, three-day, cross-country train trip with the gang, Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board. Hes less pleasantly surprised however, when that mystery is interrupted by a second mystery, then a third, then a fourth

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized Best in Show ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesnt want to take it slow and practice.

But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are on holiday and board a high-speed train only to realise that Lamput is also on the same train, except hes in First Class! During the train journey, the Docs try to get from Coach into First Class but are refused entry by the trains Captain. They then disguise themselves as train staff and finally get in, ready to capture the unsuspecting Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs and Lamput are excited because the FunFair is in town! But after the Docs cause havoc for the Carnival Clown during his juggling act, Lamput tries to make things right. The Clown is delighted in his new found friend and the two of them disappear into his House of Fun, with the Docs giving chase. But not all is as it seems inside the mysterious fun house, and the Docs have to come up with a cunning plan to capture Lamput and avoid upsetting the Clown any more!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder, then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside, until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Little Quacker develops the ability to sing like Pavarotti. But when Tom plots to use this to win a prize on the "Pets With Talent" TV show, Little Quacker refuses and Jerry covers for him. As things continue to snowball, its up to Tom to attempt saving the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Kitty Caterwaul goes missing the night before the opening of her new musical, "Kitty Foiled," her agent begs Tom and Jerry to take on the case. The search leads the detectives backstage, where they encounter chaos and no shortage of people who could have had a motive. Will the clues lead them to a culprit much closer to home?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, a bat snatches up Tom by his tail. He is carried off to a castle in the mountains and emerges in a full Dracula cape and fangs. The real Dracula appears and demands a snack. Tom swoops down on a tiny mouse village, scaring the villagers and carrying off a few. An angry mob with torches and rakes call on Jerry Van Mouseling to go rescue their kin.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Ginger keeps an abandoned pet hamster unbeknown to Rick, Jerry takes its place after the hamster scurries off. However, Jerry soon gets displaced by baby hamsters that keep multiplying. Soon the situation is out of control.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is in charge of the manors clay shooting machine, but Jerry and Tuffy interfere with the afternoons events.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a gorgeous feline walks into the Cat and Mouse Detective Agency, Tom is immediately smitten. But someone has already stolen her hearta heart-shaped cake made for a gangster and his fiancee on their upcoming engagement. He asked for the expensive engagement ring to be baked into the batter as a Valentines Day surprise, but the cake and the jewelry were stolen from the bakery window.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: A very bad parking choice on Freds part leads the gang to an asteroid mining base in outer space where an alien virus appears to be infecting the crew one by one, turning them into evil skull-headed aliens. The paranoid, terrified gang must try to solve the mystery before the virus reaches them, as well if it hasnt already!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om een sneeuwstorm te ontwijken checkt de groep in bij een eng enorm hotel wat geleid wordt door een man die erg strikt is over de regels die opgesteld zijn door zijn overleden moeder. De groep komt erachter dat de straf voor een overtreding uitgevoerd wordt door de geest van de overleden moeder zelf.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before hes chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but its too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop until hes thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through. / Once upon a time the Penguin boy visits the Bear. He tries to entertain him and involve him in various activities but the Penguin spends most of the time playing with Masha.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build them a home underground. Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Theres Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that its a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Specs tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwals new drone that he doesnt notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwals car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thiefs warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwals flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A street mime artist takes a shine to Mr. Bean when the pair meet in the local park. Because Mr. Bean fails to pay him, the mime follows Mr. Bean to his apartment when hes not looking and breaks Mrs. Wickets water statue. But eventually, Mr. Bean manages to out-mime him!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy is surprised to see his old childhood first crush has become a Goth. Embarrassed that he hasnt changed at all, Shaggy attends a Goth party with the gang, allowing himself to become initiated into the Goth culture, much to Scoobys concern - especially when the gang discovers theres a ferocious plant monster roaming the corridors of the abandoned hospital the Goths call home.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Catch the best Shaggy episodes in these thrilling adventures. From mystery-solving to ghost-hunting, theres no quest too tricky for the gang!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before he is turned into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spikes bones are missing, and Frankie the Rat is the culprit. Now all they have to do is catch in the dirty rat in the act.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The detectives across the hall are responsible for a series of high profile thefts and are framing innocent people for the crimes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse are hired to find out who absconded with Hoops McJumpalots lucky high top sneakers.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids, but it soon interferes with Hoots Talon and his friends activities. / The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesnt speak up.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing flies high over Gotham in her video diary as she shares exciting tips and tricks to what makes her brand of crimefighting so special!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: If Mush-Mush had Bollys speed, hed want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. But Bolly is different he just likes to use his speed helping Mushables. So when Mush-Mush organizes a big stunt for Bolly, he refuses. He just doesnt like to show off. But Mush-Mush promised everyone a show so a show he will give them with Mush-Mush performing instead of Bolly! Gulp!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore -- all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before hes chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but its too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop until hes thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddys picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines and soon enough, hes been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like hes cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before -- touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez performed at Abu Dhabis Etihad Arena in July, one of dozens of events that take place here every year. Stars like her regularly steal the show. But we are shifting the spotlight to the men and women that bring these performances to life. We go behind the scenes at both the JLo concert and the Arenacross World Championship, seeing firsthand how these shows make it on stage.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: State of the Union with Jake Tapper and Dana Bash

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Fareed Zakaria brings viewers his insights and analysis, and interviews world leaders, artists, scientists, business leaders, global affairs analysts and other cultural observers for the Global Public Square.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: Larry Madowo sits down with Grammy-winning singer Tems in Lagos to trace her journey from bedroom producer to global icon. She opens up about her creative process, meteoric rise, and her mission to empower women through her Leading Vibe Initiative, offering an intimate look at an artist reshaping global music on her own terms.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia
programme.desc: Marketplace Asia covers the macro business trends impacting the region.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Connecting Africa
programme.desc: The innovative tech tools revolutionizing agriculture and how technology can drive deeper economic integration and support Africas journey toward a self-sufficient future.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare its found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files

Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa Tollontyota pilaamasta kaupungin uuden oopperatalon avajaisia. / Vanhemmat ovat matkoilla ja Candace kutsuu pari kaveriaan kylaan, mutta pian illanvietosta kasvaa valtavat juhlat. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace vaihtaa paikkaa kaksoisolentonsa, Druselsteinin prinsessan, kanssa ja Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaisjukeboksin. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Tohtori Tollontyo paattaa ryhtya hyvaksi, samaan aikaan kun Norm muuttaa Finiaksen ja Ferbin vahingossa vauvoiksi. Mutta kun Tollontyo tajuaa, ettei hyvyys suju hanelta, han palaa jalleen pahaksi. / 1900-luvun alkupuolella seikkailijat Finias Ohio Flynn ja Ferb Rhode Island Flecther etsivat kadonnutta temppelia Etela-Amerikasta muinaisen amuletin kanssa. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb matkaavat Druselsteiniin, dunkelmarjojen kotimaahan, ja paatyvat sovittelijoiksi vuohien kulkusuuntaa koskevassa kriisissa. Silla valin Perry auttaa tohtori Tollontyota uusimaan ajokorttinsa ja Candace yrittaa selvittaa poikien katoavien keksintojen mysteeria tieteen keinoin. / Buford pukeutuu karhuksi auttaakseen ranskalaisia partiotyttoja hankkimaan ansiomerkin. Tilanne muuttuu monimutkaisemmaksi, kun kay ilmi, etta ollessaan Pariisissa Buford seurusteli yhden tytoista kanssa. Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa tohtori Tollontyota pilaamasta Danvillen rinkeliviikkoja.

programme.title: Nullpunkt
programme.desc: Johannes on koolis kaimisest loobunud. Ta ajab taga temalt laulusnad varastanud muusikaprodutsenti ega anna alla, kui mees teda ignoreerida tahab. Berdi juures peol kohtab ta vana klasside Riinat, kellega suhtlemine tekitab terava vastasseisu Zaiidiga. Reissoor Mihkel Ulk. Tootja Allfilm O.

programme.title: Terevisioon

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Ernst Kessleri ehitatud orel on Ameerika vanim pill, mis asub Alaskal. Kuidas eestlasest meistri too nii kaugele judis ja kus Eestis tema pill klab, seletab oreliprofessor Andres Uibo. Lia Virkus jagab retsepti, millega saab ara kasutada sugisesed unad. Reet kohtub ule mere Rootsist laulupeole tulnud lapseplvesbra Marega, kellest sai esimene vanematele valismaale tagasi antud laps. Saatejuht Reet Linna, kaasautor Aivi Parijgi.

programme.title: Eesti lood
programme.desc: Aja puudutus viib uute kunstiavastuste kannule. Sajandite tolm puhitakse maalingult, mille olemasolust polnud kellelgi siiani aimu. Professori ja kunstiakadeemia dekaani Hilkka Hiiopi jalil asutakse lummavat aaret puhastama, uurima ning autorit otsima. Kige selle kaigus muutub aeg kaega katsutavaks, seigeldakse tudmatutel ja seni labi uurimata ajalooradadel. Reissoor Maria Uppin, operaator, varvimaaraja Robi Uppin, toimetaja Merle Karro-Kalberg, monteerija Maria Uppin, helilooja, helireissoor Robi Uppin, graafika Joosep Maripuu, produtsent Maria Uppin. Tootja Black Plastic Media Productions O.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Markii ja Curro lahedus hairib Cruzi. Salvador on veendunud, et Mara armastab Lopet. Uued kohustused on Maurole rasked. Abel teeb Janale abieluettepaneku.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Kogu pere laheb vaatama Jani monoetendust Suuria sjast ja Facebookist. Tauno lobiseb kogemata valja pikantseid seiku oma abielust. Severi saab prutava uudise.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Kogu perekond laheb Jussi-galale, kus Jani otsustab parast Miss Soome saatuslikku viga ohjad enda katte vtta.

programme.title: Marika Vaarik. Radikaalne loobuja
programme.desc: Naitleja Marika Vaarik on oma viimased aastakumned manginud otsingulistes lavastustes. Tema enda snul on saarane teatrikeel vajalik selleks, et juda endast suuremate aratundmiste ja uldistusteni. Kige olulisemaks peab ta sellel teel truppi - kaasteelisi, kellega lavastustest lavastusse koos liikuda. Tema sunnipaevasaade ei keskendu Marika Vaariku eluloole, vaid tema kunstilistele phimtetele, mida aitavad avada Marika kolleegid ja temaga koostood teinud lavastajad. Reissoor Marianne Krver, toimetaja Eero Epner, operaatorid Jekaterina Abramova ja Marianne Krver, muusika Jakob Juhkam, tootja Klaasmeri O. Tana on Marika Vaarikul 63. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mikei etutar Anne ja tema sbratar Louise tulevad nadalavahetuseks kulla ning tekitavad paksu pahandust, mis lpeb murgitusega. Lord Ashfordlyle saabub kulaline, vene vurst Nikolai, kes armastab veini ja laia elu, kuid on hadas podagraga. Vurst palkab ihukaitsjaks Vernoni ja maksab Vene rublades. Bellamy kavandab Ginale ilusat ullatust, kuid David keerab kik kihva.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Johannes ja Kristjan arutavad, mida uude aastasse kaasa vtta. Evald mtleb oma vanusele. Pille ei taha asjatult oodata. Sumbergid valmistuvad peoks. Evelin tutvustab Arele Allanit. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Tauno on krvuni armunud Leenasse, keda kohtab sbra brantil, kuid lapsed kahtlevad tema motiivide ehtsuses. Eevi otsustab panna kirja oma lusikaloendi ehk viimaste soovide nimekirja. Taavi nuab meessoost sotsiaaltootajat. Jani on endiselt ebasoosingus ja ka Severi ideed kipuvad liiva jooksma.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Jeronimo kahtlustab, et Pelayo on armunud. Manuel sidab minema. Lopelt saabub lpuks kiri. Cruz kasib Lorenzol Curro minema saata.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Avahooaja pingeline lpp viib meid tagasi Buchasse, kus ootamatu kohtumine salaparase naisega raputab osalisi. Anastassia ja Grigori seisavad silmitsi kusimusega, kas nad suudavad lahti lasta oma varasematest vaadetest, seega hus draamat.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: 13. oktoobril oli 100. sunniaastapaev nukufilmide reissooril Heino Parsil, kes ti looduse enneolematul viisil nukufilmi. Tema filmid nagu "Operaator Kps seeneriigis" ja "Meemeistrite linn" on vitnud vaatajate sudemeid labi kumnendite. Uurime, milline oli tema panus nukufilmi ajalukku. lemiste jarve aares on Eesti uks suuremaid nahkhiirte sugisrande-eelseid koondumispaiku. Jalgime, kuidas teadlased nahkhiiri puuavad, et uurida nende tervisenaitajaid. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Valisilm
programme.desc: Valispoliitilisi sundmusi ja Eesti valispoliitikat kommenteerivad ning analuusivad "Aktuaalse kaamera" valistoimetuse ajakirjanikud. Saatejuht Astrid Kannel.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: Donald Trump on otsustanud kehtestada USA kaubanduspartneritele tollid. Selgub aga, et meetmed ei pruugi aidata neid, kelle kasuks need on meldud. Uurime, keda uued tollid USA-s kige enam mjutavad.

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: Klassikatahtede kolmandas saates saavad klassikahitid taiesti uue nao ja varske kla. Vistlejatel tuleb esitada tootlus maailmamuusika tuntud paladest. Viis jaab kull aratuntavaks, aga kik muu klab teistmoodi juurde on pimitud kaunistusi, vahetatud seadeid, lisatud varve ja tehnilisi vimkasid. Kuidas noored ulesandega hakkama saavad, hindavad dirigent, helilooja ja kogenud arraneerija Rasmus Puur, maailmaklassi jazzpianist Ameerikast Holger Marjamaa ning ooperigurmaan ja Klassikatahtede esimene saatejuht Marko Reikop. Saate autorid on Helen Valkna, Anu Valba ja Timo Steiner, saatejuht Johan Randvere ning reissoor Krista Luts. Konkurss Klassikatahed sunnib Eesti Televisiooni, Klassikaraadio, Eesti Kontserdi ja Kultuuripartnerlus SA koostoos.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mikei etutar Anne ja tema sbratar Louise tulevad nadalavahetuseks kulla ning tekitavad paksu pahandust, mis lpeb murgitusega. Lord Ashfordlyle saabub kulaline, vene vurst Nikolai, kes armastab veini ja laia elu, kuid on hadas podagraga. Vurst palkab ihukaitsjaks Vernoni ja maksab Vene rublades. Bellamy kavandab Ginale ilusat ullatust, kuid David keerab kik kihva.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 1967. aastal toimus Tallinnas esimene suur rahvusvaheline dassifestival. Sundmusel oli tohutu kaal Eesti ja lahiumbruse muusikaelule. ETV ahiivis on olemas ka dokumentaalne jaadvustus, mille kallal tootasid mitmed vttegrupid ja paljud tegijad. Autor ja saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Ringvaade

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Reissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: 13. oktoobril oli 100. sunniaastapaev nukufilmide reissooril Heino Parsil, kes ti looduse enneolematul viisil nukufilmi. Tema filmid nagu "Operaator Kps seeneriigis" ja "Meemeistrite linn" on vitnud vaatajate sudemeid labi kumnendite. Uurime, milline oli tema panus nukufilmi ajalukku. lemiste jarve aares on Eesti uks suuremaid nahkhiirte sugisrande-eelseid koondumispaiku. Jalgime, kuidas teadlased nahkhiiri puuavad, et uurida nende tervisenaitajaid. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Kui Kassaris mere aarde sattuda vib tunduda, et oled filmis. Hobused toimetavad rannaniidul nailiselt nagu nad ei oleks kellegi omad. Aga nad on. Triinu ja tema perekonna sudameasi on hoolitseda looduslikul moel rannaniidu elurikkuse sailimise eest. Ja nende tooriistadeks on hobused. Kuid mitte ainult, Triinu hobustega saab ka matlake minna ja sporti teha. Kui aga sugis uksele koputab vtab Triinu unapressi ja laheb mooda Eestit unu mahlaks ajama. Reporter-toimetaja Kerli Dello, reissoor Mikk Mae.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Jeronimo kahtlustab, et Pelayo on armunud. Manuel sidab minema. Lopelt saabub lpuks kiri. Cruz kasib Lorenzol Curro minema saata.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Tauno on krvuni armunud Leenasse, keda kohtab sbra brantil, kuid lapsed kahtlevad tema motiivide ehtsuses. Eevi otsustab panna kirja oma lusikaloendi ehk viimaste soovide nimekirja. Taavi nuab meessoost sotsiaaltootajat. Jani on endiselt ebasoosingus ja ka Severi ideed kipuvad liiva jooksma.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Kostuumikunstnik Mare Raidmaa laos vaatame kostuume ja esemeid, mis filmides nagu " Ruudi", " Kalev", " Georg ", "Metsluiged" ja paljudes teistes aidanud luua karaktereid ja ajastut. Selles pnevas maailmas otsib vajalikku koos Mare Raidmaaga Reet Linna.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sissi saab perekonna saladusele jalile ja puuab ema veenda viimaks ttt raakima. Louis peab otsustama, kas ta suudab Henriettest ameti parast loobuda. Kuningas Ludwig naitab Sophie Charlottele oma haavatavust. Sissi osaleb vaatamata Franzi keelule viduajamisel.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Maakonna ulemerif Andrew Parkin istub purjuspai rooli ja ajab inimese alla, kuid tema naine vtab suu enda peale. Ainsa tunnistaja jutt ei tundu usaldusvaarne. Vernon organiseerib kosjakontori, ent see kukub labi. Gina leiab, et ta siiski ei armasta Phili. Phil laheb politseisse tagasi.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Pder teeb Arele toopakkumise. Johannes ja Aleksander pevad aja kadumise sundroomi. Jurka peab vana patu eest vastust andma. Evaldile tehakse Pille parast etteheiteid. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Tauno nuab lastelt juliselt Leena heakskiitmist. Taavi leiab, et valge lihasoojast heteromees on valjasurev liik ja uritab end muuseumis eksponeerida. Eevi hakkab avastama erapraksise varjukulgi.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Lorenzo teeb Currole ettepaneku pinguid jatkata. Valentn pakub end koogiabiliseks. Jimena plaanib mesinadalaid. Feliciano otsustab kik ules tunnistada.

programme.title: Queen of Fucking Everything
programme.desc: Linda tunnistab Markele kik ules. Rahvusvaheline firma ahvardab taanduda tehingust, mida Linda on puudnud nendega teha. Linda peab protsessi kiirendama. Borje saab uut infot Koistise kadumise kohta ja Spora maksab Linda valede eest ranka hinda. Kui pinge igast suunast aina kasvab, on Linda sunnitud tegema viimase vaga riskantse kaigu.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios suttivad tuled, et jatkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast puhendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.

programme.desc: Hallitus painostaa Gustave Eiffelia luomaan jotakin vuoden 1889 Pariisin maailmannayttelyyn. Kun Eiffel tapaa naisen menneisyydestaan, kohtaaminen innoittaa hanta muuttamaan Pariisin siluetin ikuisiksi ajoiksi.

programme.title: Autohullut

programme.title: Hellapoliisi

programme.title: Aarteenetsija Hellevaara
programme.desc: K1 J1 Aarteenetsija Hellevaara on leppoisa ja rento sarja aarteenetsinnasta. Hellevaara etsii aarteita hyvin tyypillisesti esimerkiksi metallinpaljastimella, mutta muitakin keinoja on kaytossa. Mika on aarre? Se voi kaytannossa olla jotain materiaalia, mutta sen ulottuvuus voi olla myos jossain muussa.

programme.title: Before Sunset
programme.desc: Jesse ja Celine tutustuivat toisiinsa yhdeksan vuotta sitten junassa Budapestista Wieniin. Yhteisen yon jalkeen heidan tiensa erkanivat ennen auringonnousua. Nyt he tapaavat jalleen toisensa Pariisissa ja saavat mahdollisuuden selvittaa, mihin heidan ensitapaamisensa olisi voinut johtaa. Aikaa on kuitenkin nytkin liian vahan.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Murhatarinat ja vakivaltarikokset kerrotaan usein johtavien tutkijoiden nakokulmasta. Enta paikkakunnalla asuvat ihmiset? He voivat tietaa ratkaisevat vihjeet. Riipaisevassa rikossarjassa rikostutkinta viedaan takaisin ruohonjuuritasolle. Naapurit, ystavat ja tuttavat kertovat nakemyksensa kammottavista rikoksista.
